message.body: I am free tomorrow (Tuesday ) all day. So we can meet if you want. What time? The shuttles arrive at 9:05- 10:20- and 11:20 respectively. There are afternoon ones too.
Thank you so much dear Farnaz. I will try and send you a message when I get to my computer.
I am going to bed in about half hour. I 'll check my email before sleeping and then in the morning :)
Sorry. It has been a long day. I'll call you first thing in the morning. Probably we'll meet PM Good night, sweet dreams
Dear Farnaz, good morning. What time is best for you?
Fine. When would you be there? 10 ish? Later?
In sha Allah. Have a nice day.
This texting is acting funny. There is a strange delay in the messages!! 10:20 is when the shuttle arrives. See you soon
